mapper.select: SELECT no,id,isreply,subject,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday,hit,group_step,group_id,num FROM (SELECT no,id,isreply,subject,regdate,hit,group_step,group_id,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,id,isreply,subject,regdate,hit,group_step,group_id FROM replyboard WHERE group_step!=1 ORDER BY group_id DESC , group_step ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT group_id,group_step FROM replyboard WHERE no=#{no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM replyboard WHERE group_id=#{group_id} AND group_step=1
